title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the JavaScript `new Date()` function with the value '3/2/2005', an error message is thrown while trying to apply it as a filter on a table.
OB: The error message is thrown when attempting to use the value `new Date('3/2/2005')` as a filter on a table.
EB: The error message should not be thrown when using the value `new Date('3/2/2005')` as a filter on a table.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the filter value, input `new Date('3/2/2005')` as the date.
